name: #Revenge
description: From Politics to Bombs that can destroy the Universe, #Revenge is a FanGame for Twitch Streamer Awesomnessticity! It contains Well-Known Viewers and People of his stream and makes it into a fictional story that could happen but is very unlikely. The Game is Seperated into 3 Parts/Stories and also has A Behind the Scenes Section with Infomation about the Game's Development.
